original_title: รัก ละ เลย
overview: A tragedy love story set in the dark underbelly of Bangkok. Som, the daughter of a sex worker, believes that love will lead her towards a better life. Ter, a young criminal, robs just to buy love that doesn’t exist. Redlife explores a world that is broken, ignored, and which offers no escape.
tagline: Where it feels like no way out
title: REDLIFE
